comment: /**  * Static factory for the "best" JSON parser available on the classpath. Tries  * Jackson, then Gson, Snake YAML, and then falls back to the {@link BasicJsonParser}.  * @return a {@link JsonParser}  */
code: /**  * Static factory for the "best" JSON parser available on the classpath. Tries  * Jackson, then Gson, Snake YAML, and then falls back to the {@link BasicJsonParser}.  * @return a {@link JsonParser}  */ public static JsonParser getJsonParser() {     if (ClassUtils.isPresent("com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper", null)) {         return new JacksonJsonParser().     }     if (ClassUtils.isPresent("com.google.gson.Gson", null)) {         return new GsonJsonParser().     }     if (ClassUtils.isPresent("org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml", null)) {         return new YamlJsonParser().     }     return new BasicJsonParser(). }
